TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripContainer extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl

summary.span: 在窗体的每一侧提供面板，并提供可以容纳一个或多个控件的中间面板。

span.span: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类似于。 is similar to . 它使用四个停靠的侧面板 (的实例) 和一个中间面板 (实例) 若要创建典型的排列方式。It uses four docked side panels (instances of ) and one central panel (an instance of ) to create a typical arrangement. 不能删除侧面板，但可以通过设置其各自隐藏它们， ， ，和属性设置为`false`。You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective , , , and properties to `false`. 默认情况下，每个属性是`true`在设计时。By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time. 在设计时，还尚未展开其顶部面板，会显示。Also at design time, the appears with its top panel already expanded. 不能删除或隐藏。You can neither remove nor hide the . 一个或多个可以排列， ，或侧面板，，和中的控件可以使用其他控件的中间面板。You can arrange one or more , , or controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls. 还提供了一种方法获取呈现器支持到实现一致的外观窗体的正文。The also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance. 不支持多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序。 does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications. 使用为 MDI 应用程序。Use for MDI applications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加和一个向 Windows 窗体，将项添加到，并添加到的。The following code example demonstrates adding a and a to a Windows Forms, adding items to the , and adding the to the of the . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.toolstripcontainer2/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.toolstripcontainer2/vb/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
